title: Service Review System
desc: A full-stack web application for users to review and interact with various services, featuring robust service and review management.
details: This project allows users to manage services and reviews in a user-friendly interface. Challenges included implementing real-time search and filters, managing JWT authentication, and integrating user dashboards. Future improvements involve enhancing the dashboard with analytics and adding multi-language support.

title: Movie Portal
desc: A user-friendly platform to explore, manage, and review movies with dynamic features.
details: This project allows users to explore movies, manage favorites, and add their own movie entries. Challenges included implementing dynamic carousels and dark/light mode themes. Future improvements include integrating movie recommendations and enhancing UI accessibility.

title: Forest Expeditions
desc: A platform connecting nature enthusiasts with adventure consultants for custom outdoor experiences.
details: This project connects users with professional consultants for planning eco-adventures like hiking and camping. Challenges included implementing dynamic sliders and secure authentication. Future improvements include expanding the range of adventure categories and adding multilingual support.

title: Gadget Store
desc: An interactive gadget store with dynamic cart and wishlist management.
details: This project showcases an online gadget store with features like dynamic cart and wishlist management, real-time updates, and category-based product filtering. Challenges included implementing real-time event handling for cart updates and ensuring data persistence using local storage. Future plans include integrating the Context API for global state management and adding user authentication.

title: Cricket Dream Team Selection
desc: Assemble your ultimate Dream 11 cricket team with budget management and player stats.
details: This project allows users to create their dream cricket team by selecting up to 6 players within a coin budget. Key features include real-time coin tracking, player stats-based selection, and validation to prevent duplicate selections. Interactive feedback through React-Toastify enhances the user experience. Future plans include adding team performance analytics and sharing options.

title: Peddy - Pet Adoption Platform
desc: A platform connecting pet lovers with pets available for adoption, featuring categories like dogs, cats, rabbits, and birds.
details: Peddy is a web-based application enabling users to browse pets by category and adopt them through an interactive process. Key features include a responsive design, countdown adoption process, loading spinner for data fetching, and modals for detailed pet information. Future plans involve integrating user authentication and a pet adoption history feature.
